tags: i don't even know what to tag this
summary: My crack 2am thoughts while watching the new episode: “Wha- what is this weird crooked angle that they're filming at? I know its...
body:
My crack 2am thoughts while watching the new episode:

“Wha- what is this weird crooked angle that they’re filming at? I know its supposed to be all mysterious and shit but turn the camera back please”

“lmfao that secret society letter looks like he’s getting accepted to Hogwarts”

*bowie comes out in tux*“aw this show is really gonna make me ship bexie so much more if they keep giving us these cute scenes but like why is this their most well-developed relationship right now fdjskfsd”

*5 minutes in*”i miss tj already”

“Cyrus- ‘I’ll only join for research purposes’ Cyrus your Josh is peeking through”

“Buffy- ‘Has anyone ever told you-you should be an actor?’ hardy har hard good one disney”

“Cece- ‘Its on sale? I just fell in love with it all over again’ damnn cece is such a mood”

*halfway in and Andi gets invited now* “theres no secret society is there? This some elaborate plan to bring marty back isn’t it? I feel like hes extra enough to do something like that”

*while dress shopping* “‘as the daughter of the bride i now pronounce myself betrayed’ DAMN ANDI IM SORRY SWEETIE BUT NO AMOUNT OF “shes dramatic but shes a teenager so its fine” CAN COVER THAT ONE UP I DONT KNOW WHETHER TO BE IMPRESSED FOR THE ON THE SPOT POETRY OR JUST CRINGE AT ANOTHER ONE OF THOSE ANDI MOMENTS THE SHOW LIKES TO FORCE DOWN OUR THROATS”

*cut to when buffy gets her letter* “So like… what if buffy opens the letter and its says Will You…. go out with me? AND MARTY APPEARS LIKE THE GHOST OF HER PAST”

*buffy throws away the letter, storms off, then comes back and picks up the letter right there* “uhh nah she threw that shit away how did she pick up that letter so easily”

“Smoke from the door??? Damn i love this show but its dramatic as hell sometimes”

*buffy goes into the room and theyre chanting over a circle of candles* “ok this episode was like creepy i guess but what kind of satanic cult shit is this”

“See I’d say they were having a seance but the only thing those three summoned was a major rejection”

Most importantly: *i sit nervously, sweat forming, constantly checking the time left in the episode now realizing Marty hasnt shown up* “HOLD ONE FLYING FUCK UP. WHERE THE HELL IS MARTY THATS ALL I CARED ABOUT IN THIS FILLER EPISODE WHAT WAS THAT”

“NOW WAIT ANOTHER SECOND THIS WHOLE THING WAS FOR WALKER?? I THOUGHT IT WOULD BE MARTY TRYING TO COME GET HIS GIRL BUT IT WAS WALKER?”

“can i get some context on when Buffy started HATING walker?? Because UHH last time i checked they were a thing and now after seeing the promo shes all like ‘damn cant believe he actually thought id say yes to the promposal’ well m’am usually when you show attraction to somebody and put effort towards a romantic relationship one might assume you want to be with them (dont take this seriously i love buffy with my whole heart)”

Final thought: I dont know what kind of drugs they were on when they wrote that episode but all i can leave the writers with is this golden piece of advice

summary:
I think the reason I can write the minds of Tyrus so well is because:
Like Cyrus, I have anxiety and am good at reading people,...
body:
I think the reason I can write the minds of Tyrus so well is because:

  • Like Cyrus, I have anxiety and am good at reading people, and it makes me over analyze everything
  • Like TJ, I have horrible impulse control when I get excited and I have disappointed everyone who loves me at least once because of that fact

reblog.comment:

  • Like TJ, I have horrible impulse control when I get excited and I have disappointed everyone who loves me at least once because of that fact

I think the reason I can write the minds of Tyrus so well is because:

  • Like Cyrus, I have anxiety and am good at reading people, and it makes me over analyze everything
  • Like TJ, I have horrible impulse control when I get excited and I have disappointed everyone who loves me at least once because of that fact

summary: Celebrity crushes? Name at least 5 and why you like them
question: Celebrity crushes? Name at least 5 and why you like them
answer:
Tom Holland: precious british bean he is so cute I love him

Misha Collins: amazing and weird and funny, actually advocates for things uses fame for good. I’m proud he can work with the giant meme Jared padalecki because Jared is such a pranky boi 😂

Jensen Ackles: so beautiful, loves the fans, like so much, uses the famefor good like all the charities wow. Such a good actor like makes me feel so much on spn (like acting past words on the script)

Anna Kendrick: beautiful and funny and weird

Sabrina Carpenter: so pretty so talented damn those cheek bones

Matthew Daddario: adorable precious bean and beautiful human

Taron Egerton: welsh and beautiful and sweet and funny and welsh

Joshua Rush: adorable meme lord

Luke Mullen: the hair, the glasses, the weird insta comments

Leonardo Dicaprio: was beautiful in the 90s, love his films very talentex

summary: Hence, The Prophecy
title: Hence, The Prophecy
body:
Cyrus has been working with the gods long enough to know that they can’t be trusted, least of all Eros, but when Apollo asks him to oversee another “world saving” prophecy, how is he supposed to avoid the charming prince, especially with Cupid’s helpers flying around.

Rating: General Audiences

Archive Warning: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings

Categories: F/F F/M M/M

Fandom: Andi Mack - Fandom

Relationships: Cyrus Goodman/TJ Kippen Andi Mack/Amber Kippen Buffy Driscoll/Marty Jonah Beck/Walker Brodsky

Characters: Cyrus Goodman TJ Kippen Andi Mack Amber Kippen Buffy Driscoll Marty Jonah Beck Walker Brodsky

Additional Tags: Ancient Greece AU Tyrus - Freeform

Language:EnglishStats:Published:2019-01-15Updated:2019-01-25Words:2443Chapters:2/19

https://archiveofourown.org/works/17427272/chapters/41027831

reblog.comment:
Cyrus has been working with the gods long enough to know that they can’t be trusted, least of all Eros, but when Apollo asks him to oversee another “world saving” prophecy, how is he supposed to avoid the charming prince, especially with Cupid’s helpers flying around.

summary: I get you havr anons off but will you be answering the anon asks you have in your inbox? Assuming anons arent assholes
question: I get you havr anons off but will you be answering the anon asks you have in your inbox? Assuming anons arent assholes
answer: Most of them, yeah! I’m taking answering asks slow today anyways because I kind of burned myself out yesterday (I think I answered like over 100?? asks while waiting for the episode to drop) so I am quite literally exhausted lmao. But once I get bored enough I will backtrack and answer whichever questions I feel like responding to.
